content.text: SNIPER: iplookup - GeoIP & Network Information Tool

text: A fast and simple tool to find geolocation and network information for a public
IP address or domain name. It uses the free tier of the [cyan]ip-api.com[/] service.
â€¢ [bold]Geolocation:[/] Country, Region, City, Zip Code, Latitude, Longitude.
â€¢ [bold]Network Info:[/] ISP (Internet Service Provider), Organization, AS Number.
[#] Look up a public IP address:
[#] Find information about your own public IP:
â€¢ This tool is for [bold]public IPs[/] only. It will not work for private/local IP addresses (e.g., 192.168.1.1).
â€¢ The accuracy of geolocation data depends on the service provider and can vary.
â€¢ Subject to rate limits of the ip-api.com free tier.
